text:
I had a great experience here trying out their different styles of hijabs! Friendly salesperson Soniya who helped me to choose which style suits me best. The hijabs are definitely worth the price cause you can wear the inner many ways! Some photos here to show some of my favourite designs.

If you think this is only for new hijabis, trust me even as a not so new hijabi myself, I would go for it.

Do come down and try it out yourself especially if you are looking for fuss free, pinless hijabs.

I visited the store on Friday, 12/01/2024 and it was a great experience for me! I read up about Bokitta before I went there however I was still clueless about their products. The staff was kind enough to help me and explain the products to me. I was happy with my purchase and the designs are really pretty and easy to use!

If you‚Äôre looking for fuss free, beautiful hijabs and be ready in less than 5 minutes, shop Bokitta please! They come with matching inner so no need to look for an inner that matches the hijab. I also love their material because it‚Äôs breathable.

They have quite a bit of variations but my favourite has to be the Carr√®. If you‚Äôre not sure which one suits you best, head down to their store at Golden Landmark okay!
